The numbers below are interesting & provides good context.
Death rate for the corona virus is much higher though than 2.8%
Why? Deaths lag infections by at least the incubation period (1-14 days)
Thus, take deaths to date & divide it by infections +-10 days ago. Closer to SARS https://twitter.com/ArlanFF101/status/1221836097912823809 …
